name: Project: G
description:
During the previous projects brainstorming process, one of the games we thought of making was this sci fi space target shooter where you'd try and get as many points as possible. Of course we didn't end up doing it then but during this month I decided on making that idea a reality in some form due to enjoying VR games as much as I did and here is the result!

It's fully a simple demo of a VR shooter where you try and dodge shots from robot drones and survive as long as you can. It has working health and infinitely replay able without exiting the game.

3 precreated assets were used and taken from the Unity asset store which you can find here, here, and here.  Everything else was created from me and the base XR toolkit in Unity. 

Tested on Oculus Quest, there might be compatibility issues on other headsets. 

Hope you enjoy and thanks for stopping by!
